verses.verse: And the lot<WH1486> of the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> fell<WH3318> from Jordan<WH4480> <WH3383> by Jericho,<WH3405> unto the water<WH4325> of Jericho<WH3405> on the east,<WH4217> to the wilderness<WH4057> that goeth up<WH5927> from Jericho<WH4480> <WH3405> throughout mount<WH2022> Bethel,<WH1008>
And goeth out<WH3318> from Bethel<WH4480> <WH1008> to Luz,<WH3870> and passeth along<WH5674> unto<WH413> the borders<WH1366> of Archi<WH757> to Ataroth,<WH5852>

And goeth down<WH3381> westward<WH3220> to<WH413> the coast<WH1366> of Japhleti,<WH3311> unto<WH5704> the coast<WH1366> of Beth-horon<WH1032> the nether,<WH8481> and to<WH5704> Gezer:<WH1507> and the goings out<WH8444> thereof are<WH1961> at the sea.<WH3220>
So the children<WH1121> of Joseph,<WH3130> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim,<WH669> took their inheritance.<WH5157>

And the border<WH1366> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their families<WH4940> was<WH1961> thus: even the border<WH1366> of their inheritance<WH5159> on the east<WH4217> side was<WH1961> Ataroth-addar,<WH5853> unto<WH5704> Beth-horon<WH1032> the upper;<WH5945>

And the border<WH1366> went out<WH3318> toward the sea<WH3220> to Michmethah<WH4366> on the north side;<WH4480> <WH6828> and the border<WH1366> went about<WH5437> eastward<WH4217> unto Taanath-shiloh,<WH8387> and passed by<WH5674> it on the east<WH4480> <WH4217> to Janohah;<WH3239>
And it went down<WH3381> from Janohah<WH4480> <WH3239> to Ataroth,<WH5852> and to Naarath,<WH5292> and came<WH6293> to Jericho,<WH3405> and went out<WH3318> at Jordan.<WH3383>

The border<WH1366> went out<WH1980> from Tappuah<WH4480> <WH8599> westward<WH3220> unto the river<WH5158> Kanah;<WH7071> and the goings out<WH8444> thereof were<WH1961> at the sea.<WH3220> This<WH2063> is the inheritance<WH5159> of the tribe<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> by their families.<WH4940>

And the separate<WH3995> cities<WH5892> for the children<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> were among<WH8432> the inheritance<WH5159> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh,<WH4519> all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> with their villages.<WH2691>

And they drove not out<WH3423> <WH3808> <WH853> the Canaanites<WH3669> that dwelt<WH3427> in Gezer:<WH1507> but the Canaanites<WH3669> dwell<WH3427> among<WH7130> the Ephraimites<WH669> unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> and serve<WH5647> under tribute.<WH4522>
